title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 5317.7 - Battery backup requirements
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 5317.7 - Battery backup requirements

State Regulations

An interface element shall retain the required
information, for no fewer than 72 hours, after a power loss. If this data is
stored in volatile RAM, a battery backup shall be installed within the
interface element. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
5317.7

Adopted

New

York State Register November 16, 2016/Volume XXXVIII, Issue 46, eff. 11/16/2016

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
